title: ulaga vAzhilum
sahitya:
ulaga vAzvilum ninnaruL inri OraDi vaippadum eLidO Ezai


anupallavi

  kaliyil unnai marandhAl kittumO kaivalyam marumaiyil maTTumO


caraNam    dhyAna yOga japa tapangaL ariyEn satjana sangam iNangiyum aRiyEn
gAna shAstramum kaTrariyEn manam kanivilEn muruganE kuruDanEn
